Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Instruction in salsa and selected other Latin dances (meringue, bachata, cha cha) focusing on Latin dance and fitness aspects of ballroom dancing.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or departmental consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Form, style, and technique in the basic fundamental movements of tap dance.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre Major, Theatre Minor or Dance Minor and "C" (2.0) or better in any DAA course offered by the Theatre.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Periodic attendance at departmental dance classes with permission of individual instructors.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or Dance minor and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2520C or department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intermediate exploration of form, style, and technique of tap dance.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or Dance minor, and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2200C or department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and applied technique with focus on one form, such as African dance, Flamenco, Irish dance, Indian dance, etc

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or Dance minor and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2570C or department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intermediate Jazz dance using theory and practice in jazz technique.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent, and "C" (2.0) or better required in DAA 2571C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced study of jazz dance, using theory and practice of jazz technique.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent, and C (2.0) or better required in DAA 2521C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced exploration of form, style, and technique of tap dance.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or dance minor and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2200C or DAA 2201C or DAA 3208C

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic movements of American Jazz dance, including practical class work and Jazz dance history.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Fundamentals of classical ballet; includes practical dance work as well as dance history lectures.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Basic ballet, tap, and jazz technique. Recommended for students with no formal dance training.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or Dance minor and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2200C or department consent

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Intermediate classical ballet technique, including principles, theory, and practice technique.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: DAA 2100C, Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theory and practice of dance composition.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Instruction in selected ballroom dances (foxtrot, waltz, rumba, swing, samba, cha cha, tango, quickstep) focusing on dance and fitness aspects of ballroom dancing.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent, and C (2.0) or better required in DAA 2100C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Student practice in choreographing a concert dance work for public performance.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major or dance minor and "C" (2.0) or better in DAA 2200C or DAA 2201C or DAA 3208C

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Exploration of form, style, and technique in creative movement. Includes practical class work and history lectures.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent, C (2.0) or better required in DAA 2200C, or DAA 2201C, or DAA 3208C and audition.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Student performance in a concert dance work.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Theatre major, Dance minor, or department consent, and C (2.0) or better required in DAA 2201C.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced classical ballet technique, including principles, theory, and practice technique.
